text: RT @TimTeeman: 1/ I talked to Melissa Zarda about winning her late brother Donald's LGBTQ discrimination case at the Supreme Court. “On a grander scale this case wasn’t just about Don. To have his memory and legacy on the right side of history is incredible.” https://t.co/B714sdfVA1

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @TimTeeman: 2/ “Don would be extremely happy and overjoyed by the decision,” Melissa Zarda told me. “I can see his face right now, I can see it so well, it’s like he is almost here. His face is absolutely beaming, and he had a smile bigger than any room anyway.” https://t.co/B714sdfVA1

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @TimTeeman: 3/ Melissa Zarda paid tribute to the other LGBTQ plaintiffs in the case, and vowed to continue fighting for the Equality Act, and against all discrimination. “I’m so glad Don stood up. I’m so glad that Gerald stood up. I’m so glad that Aimee stood up.” https://t.co/B714sdfVA1
